ca.mcgill.hs.prefs
Class PreferenceFactory

java.lang.Object
  ca.mcgill.hs.prefs.PreferenceFactory

public class PreferenceFactory
extends java.lang.Object

An API allowing plugin programmers to easily generate preference objects.

Method Detail

broadcastIntent

private static void broadcastIntent(android.content.Context context)
Broadcasts an intent whenever a preference has changed.

Parameters:
context - The context in which the intent will be broadcast.

createPreferenceHierarchy

public static android.preference.PreferenceScreen createPreferenceHierarchy(android.preference.PreferenceActivity activity,
                                                                            java.lang.Class<? extends Plugin>[] plugins)
This method creates a PreferenceScreen from the available Plugins classes.

Parameters:
activity - A PreferenceActivity in which this screen will be displayed.
plugins - A list of plugins to generate preferences for.
Returns:
A PreferenceScreen with the appropriate Preference objects.

getButtonPreference

public static android.preference.Preference getButtonPreference(android.preference.PreferenceActivity activity,
                                                                java.lang.String key,
                                                                int titleResId,
                                                                int summaryDefResId)

getCheckBoxPreference

public static android.preference.CheckBoxPreference getCheckBoxPreference(android.preference.PreferenceActivity activity,
                                                                          java.lang.String key,
                                                                          int titleResId,
                                                                          int summaryDefResId,
                                                                          int summaryOnResId,
                                                                          int summaryOffResId,
                                                                          boolean defaultValue)
Returns a CheckBoxPreference preference specified by the parameters. This method does not use resource IDs for its parameters.

Parameters:
activity - The PreferenceActivity in which this preference will appear
key - The key of this preference.
titleResId - The resource ID for the title of this preference.
summaryDefResId - The resource ID for the default summary of this preference.
summaryOnResId - The resource ID for the summary displayed when this checkbox is checked.
summaryOffResId - The resource ID for the summary displayed when this checkbox is unchecked.
Returns:
A CheckBoxPreference object.

getCheckBoxPreference

public static android.preference.CheckBoxPreference getCheckBoxPreference(android.preference.PreferenceActivity activity,
                                                                          java.lang.String key,
                                                                          java.lang.String title,
                                                                          java.lang.String summaryDef,
                                                                          java.lang.String summaryOn,
                                                                          java.lang.String summaryOff,
                                                                          boolean defaultValue)
Returns a CheckBoxPreference preference specified by the parameters. This method does not use resource IDs for its parameters.

Parameters:
activity - The PreferenceActivity in which this preference will appear
key - The key of this preference.
title - The String for the title of this preference.
summaryDef - The String for the default summary of this preference.
summaryOn - The String for the summary displayed when this checkbox is checked.
summaryOff - The String for the summary displayed when this checkbox is unchecked.
Returns:
A CheckBoxPreference object.

getListPreference

public static android.preference.ListPreference getListPreference(android.preference.PreferenceActivity activity,
                                                                  int entriesResId,
                                                                  int entryValuesResId,
                                                                  java.lang.Object defaultValue,
                                                                  java.lang.String key,
                                                                  int titleResId,
                                                                  int summaryResId)
Returns a ListPreference preference specified by the parameters. This method uses resource IDs for its parameters.

Parameters:
activity - The PreferenceActivity in which this preference will appear
entriesResId - The resource ID for the text entries of this preference.
entryValuesResId - The resource ID for the entry values of this preference.
defaultValue - The default value of this preference.
key - The key of this preference.
titleResId - The resource ID for the title of this preference.
summaryResId - The resource ID for the summary of this preference.
Returns:
A ListPreference object.

getListPreference

public static android.preference.ListPreference getListPreference(android.preference.PreferenceActivity activity,
                                                                  java.lang.String[] entries,
                                                                  java.lang.String[] entryValues,
                                                                  java.lang.Object defaultValue,
                                                                  java.lang.String key,
                                                                  java.lang.String title,
                                                                  java.lang.String summary)
Returns a ListPreference preference specified by the parameters. This method does not use resource IDs for its parameters.

Parameters:
activity - The PreferenceActivity in which this preference will appear
entries - The String array of entries for this preference.
entryValues - The String array of values for this preference.
defaultValue - The default value of this preference.
key - The key of this preference.
title - The String for the title of this preference.
summary - The String for the summary of this preference.
Returns:
A ListPreference object.

getSeekBarPreference

public static SeekBarPreference getSeekBarPreference(android.preference.PreferenceActivity activity,
                                                     android.util.AttributeSet attrs,
                                                     java.lang.String key)
Returns a SeekBarPreference.

Parameters:
activity - The PreferenceActivity in which this preference will appear
attrs - The attributes for this seekbar
key - The unique key that identifies this preference
Returns:
A new SeekBarPreference with the specified attributes.

getSharedPreferences

public static android.content.SharedPreferences getSharedPreferences()

setContext

public static void setContext(android.content.Context context)
IMPORTANT: This method must be called before using this factory!

Parameters:
context - The context in which these preferences live.
